net.minecraft.item.crafting

接口 IRecipeSerializer<T extends IRecipe<?>>

  • 所有超级接口:
    IForgeRegistryEntry<IRecipeSerializer<?>>
    所有已知实现类:

    public interface IRecipeSerializer<T extends IRecipe<?>>
extends IForgeRegistryEntry<IRecipeSerializer<?>>
